nodes.title: Maximizing Video Marketing: 5 Tips for A Successful Business in 2024
nodes.description: Video marketing has become the heart of digital marketing campaigns. Video marketing offers various benefits for your business, from rising brand awareness to boosting SEO and sales. In the following blog post, you will learn 5 tips to maximize your video marketing in 2024.
nodes.coverAlt: Maximizing Video Marketing: 5 Tips for A Successful Business in 2024

nodes.title: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
nodes.description: AI transcription is now a standard feature in productivity toolkits. What does this mean for your business?
nodes.coverAlt: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools

nodes.title: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation To Empower Occupational Therapists
nodes.description: Working with developmentally challenged children is very rewarding work. Read how NSW Health is using video translation to help its occupational therapists.
nodes.coverAlt: How NSW Health Is Using Video Translation

nodes.title: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions
nodes.description: Community captions are a function in YouTube. This function allows a YouTuber to crowd source captions. YouTube is shutting this down. Here is how it will affect you!
nodes.coverAlt: Why YouTube Stopped Community Caption Contributions

nodes.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
nodes.description: Vyasa University is working to raise awareness about Covid-19. Read more about how they used video translation to reach stakeholders across 8 Indian languages.
nodes.coverAlt: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation

nodes.title: How QAChef Is Reaching Clients In A Tough Market
nodes.description: QAChef a tech company in hospitality - is using video translation in Chinese and Arabic to gain new clients in a tough climate using marketing localization and marketing internationalization.
nodes.coverAlt: Bagaimana QAChef Menjangkau Klien Di Pasar yang Sulit

nodes.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
nodes.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

nodes.title: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI
nodes.description:
AI internationalization has a important role to play in boosting your
  video ROI or ROAS. What are the options, and how can you optimize your content production
  process to take advantage of this mega-trend?
nodes.coverAlt: AI Internationalization: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI

nodes.title: AI Localisation: Help Me Help You
nodes.description:
If you want to expand your markets outside the Anglo-sphere, how to you
  best use AI? Is AI any good for localisation? What are the strengths and weaknesses
  of AI in the context of localisation.
nodes.coverAlt: AI Localisation: Help Me Help You

nodes.title: Video SEO: Keywords, Titles, Descriptions And The Transcript
nodes.description:
Video SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) can be a game changer to your
  marketing efforts. How? Transcripts! In this post we look at the details of how
  to deploy your video content to maximise SEO.
nodes.coverAlt: Video SEO: Keywords, Titles, Descriptions And The Transcript

nodes.title: How To Do Video SEO Right
nodes.description:
We all know Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) is really important. But
  how to you make sure your video content is SEO performant? Read on to learn about
  how to get your video content properly setup for SEO.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Do Video SEO Right

nodes.title: Video Series: How to Quickly Transcribe Your Video
nodes.description:
In the first of our VideoTranslator.ai video series, we show you how
  to quickly transcribe your video using our Quick Transcribe function
nodes.coverAlt: A Step by Step Video Guide to Transcribing Your Video

nodes.title: A Step by Step Guide to Translating Your First Video
nodes.description:
Have you ever tried to translate an English video? Read on to see how
  to transcribe, and translate this video from English in 3 simple steps.
nodes.coverAlt: A Step by Step Guide to Translating Your First Video

nodes.title: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?
nodes.description:
As a content creator and/or influencer engagement is top of mind. Using
  captions is a clear opportunity to increase engagement. What is the best subtitling
  and/or captioning software out there? Should you use a single tool to create the
  subtitles and a different one to merge them in?
nodes.coverAlt: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?

nodes.title: How Safe Is AI Transcription: What You Need To Know
nodes.description:
You are a content creator who uses AI. But how safe is the AI you use,
  whether for transcription, translation or dubbing. Also some tips on how to use
  AI better in your journey into expanding your market.
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese
nodes.description:
You make videos in English - how can you translate these videos into
  Filipino and Chinese? We'll show you how to translate video and also how to deploy
  making sure you have amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO
nodes.description:
How to translate a YouTube video? If you are a content creator on YouTube,
  you want to translate your video into different languages. This makes your audience
  bigger, and you get SEO benefits. This blog post shows you how to translate your
  YouTube videos, and deliver them to other social channels too.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO

nodes.title: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI
nodes.description:
How to translate your video content into Mandarin Chinese? Also known
  as clipping a video into Chinese, or a Chinese video maker, and how to deploy this
  content for amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
nodes.coverAlt: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo
nodes.coverAlt: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language

nodes.title: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI
nodes.description:
The way younger users consumer video content is evolving and marketers
  need to evolve too. In this post we look at how video content consumption is changing
  and where AI can improve your processes.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
nodes.description:
A hearing impaired couple is suing a hospital for not providing disability
  friendly facilities. Is this justified? How can you avoid being sued for not meeting
  accessibility requirements?
nodes.coverAlt: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued

nodes.title: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly
nodes.description:
We introduce the Quick Transcribe functionality. Here we have taken everything
  we learnt about how clients use our app and put it into a single workflow for fast,
  efficient transcription and translation.
nodes.coverAlt: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly

nodes.title: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency
nodes.description:
We achieved a 3x increase in our transcription efficiency using AI. Read
  on to find out how we did this, and what we learnt from changing our procedure.
nodes.coverAlt: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency

nodes.title: An Old Language Is Young Again...
nodes.description:
Today we look at work in bringing back Tifinagh, the script used to write
  the Amazigh (or Berber) languages of North Africa. We also look at what Comcast
  is doing to provide support in sign language, and why you should invest in people
  when picking a transcription, translation or dubbing commercial partner.
nodes.coverAlt: An Old Language Is young Again...

nodes.title: 60% Of The Content Produced By US YouTubers Is Watched In Other Countries
nodes.description:
Globalisation and the spread of trends beyond national borders is being
  accelerated by platforms like YouTube. One consequence is 60% of the content produced
  by U.S. YouTube creators is watched by users in other countries. Another consequence
  is the merger of the shopping and entertainment categories
nodes.coverAlt: Changes In The Internationalization And Localization Industry

nodes.title: What A Hindi Speaking AI Sounds Like
nodes.description:
In this visual guide we translate a video from English to Hindi, and
  then we use a Hindi speaking AI to speak out the translated content.
nodes.coverAlt: What A Hindi Speaking AI Sounds Like

nodes.title: Open Captions: Enhancements November 2019
nodes.description:
In this visual guide we look at new enhancements in the video translator
  app aimed at making open captions more user friendly. Now add labels where ever
  you require.
nodes.coverAlt: Open Captions: Enhancements November 2019

nodes.title: Transcribing Indian English: A Simple Guide To Using AI To Speed Up Transcription   And Add Open Captions
nodes.description:
In this visual guide we used an Indian English AI to transcribe a video
  from Rajya Sabha TV. After the transcription we used post-editing to clean up our
  captions. Finally, we use the Auto-Overlay functionality to add open captions to
  our video.
nodes.coverAlt: Transcribing Indian English: A Simple Guide To Using AI To Speed Up Transcription   And Add Open Captions

nodes.title: AI Transcription, Translation And Dubbing: How To Think About Accuracy
nodes.description:
In the world of AI Transcription, Translation and Dubbing, what does
  Accuracy mean and how can we measure it.
nodes.coverAlt: AI Transcription, Translation And Dubbing: How To Think About Accuracy

nodes.title: Text-To-Speech: AI Dubbing And What You Can Do With It
nodes.description:
In this visual guide, we look at how to add AI dubbing, or an AI voice
  over, to your content. We will take a video from Australian English to American
  English using AI.
nodes.coverAlt: Text-To-Speech: AI Dubbing And What You Can Do With It

nodes.title: What's Hot in Short Video Apps for iOS
nodes.description:
Looking for a short video clip app? We've compared the features of the
  8 best short video apps for iOS.
nodes.coverAlt: 8 Short Video Apps for iOS | Best of 2019

nodes.title: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android
nodes.description:
We take a look at the top performing short video apps in the Google Play
  Store. Read on to learn about all the features these popular short video apps for
  Android have to offer.
nodes.coverAlt: 8 Short Video Apps for Android | Best of 2019

nodes.title: 9 of China's Best Short Video Apps
nodes.description:
Short video apps are really hitting the ground running in China. In this
  article we give a basic overview of some of the major short video makers in China
  are and what unique features they have to offer.
nodes.coverAlt: 9 Best Short Video Apps you Need to Know About

nodes.title: Translating Your Video From English To French: A Step By Step Guide
nodes.description:
Have you ever tried to translate an English video to French? Read on
  to see how to translate this video from English to French in 8 simple steps.
nodes.coverAlt: Translating your video from English to French: A Step By Step Guide

nodes.title: How Do I Make Subtitles And Closed Captions?
nodes.description:
Many clients ask how us about subtitles. Generally, this is the first
  question a prospect asks us about our platform. In practise, they mean a few different
  things.
nodes.coverAlt: How Do I Make Subtitles And Closed Captions?

nodes.title: The Art Of Making Wax Hands: English To Hindi Video Translation
nodes.description:
This video is about art of making wax hands at Madame Tussauds Sydney.
  In this post, we describe the process of transcribing the video in English, and
  then translating to Hindi, using AI.
nodes.coverAlt: The Art Of Making Wax Hands: English To Hindi Video Translation

nodes.title: A Nature Of Art Bangu Yilbara Collection: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation
nodes.description:
This post is about Bangu Yilbara collection at Museum of Contemporary
  Art Australia (MCA) in Sydney. We describe how to transcribe the video in English,
  and then translate the video into Hindi, with the help of AI.
nodes.coverAlt: A Nature Of Art Bangu Yilbara Collection: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation

nodes.title: A Journey Through Australian Fashion: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation
nodes.description:
In this post, we look at a video from the Museum of Applied Arts and
  Sciences (MAAS) in Sydney, Australia. This video describes the new Centre For Fashion
  at MAAS, and its first exhibit with over 30,000 garments displayed, covering a range
  of fashion styles, from colonial Australia to contemporary Australia.
nodes.coverAlt: A Journey Through Australian Fashion: English To Hindi Video Transcription And   Translation

nodes.title: Video Translation From English To Hindi: A Convict Heritage
nodes.description:
In this post, we look at how to translate a video from English to Hindi.
  The video is from the Hyde Park Barracks Museum in Sydney, and is about a new exhibit
  at the museum.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation From English To Hindi: A Convict Heritage

nodes.title: Visual Guide: Free Trial Registration
nodes.description:
Video Translator is now offering a Free Trial of its Real Time AI Transcription
  and Translation application. This visual guide covers the registration process for
  the free trial.
nodes.coverAlt: Visual Guide: Free Trial Registration

nodes.title: How To Use Auto Overlay To Simplify Transcription
nodes.description: We look at an example where we translate a video from English to Chinese.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Use Auto Overlay To Simplify Transcription

nodes.title: We Have An Explainer Video
nodes.description: We Have An Explainer Video
nodes.coverAlt: We Have An Explainer Video

nodes.title: How To Reach Refugees, And Combat People Smugglers, With AI
nodes.description:
Video translation is all the rage in Sydney currently. The controversy
  revolves around a secret video, which the current Australian Prime Minister, Scott
  Morrison has apparently recorded.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Refugees, And Combat People Smugglers, With AI

nodes.title: How To Use AI To Save Lions, In Afrikaans
nodes.description:
In today's post, we are going to take this video from the LionWhispererTV
  and use the Speech-To-Text AI Transcription to transcribe the video.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Use AI To Save Lions, In Afrikaans

nodes.title: How To Transcribe Lots of Different Accents Accurately
nodes.description: How To Transcribe Lots of Different Accents Accurately
nodes.coverAlt: How To Transcribe Lots of Different Accents Accurately

nodes.title: How To Get The Most Out Of Your AI: English To Hindi Video Translation
nodes.description:
Today, we will cover simple heuristics to get the most out of your AI.
  As always, use the AI to do the heavy lifting, and use a human subject matter expert
  to finesse the results, producing a superior outcome with less time/effort.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Get The Most Out Of Your AI: English To Hindi Video Translation

nodes.title: How To Transcribe English Into Hebrew: ChangePlan
nodes.description:
Video Translator's platform provides a client with the ability to transcribe
  and translate content to/from a number of languages. Today, we will be using our
  video translation platform on a video from our friends at ChangePlan.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Transcribe English Into Hebrew: ChangePlan

nodes.title: How To Transcribe A Foreign Language Video
nodes.description:
Today we are going to look at how to transcribe a foreign language video.
  But how does this work when we live in a globalized world where people are from
  many different places - exactly what is foreign?
nodes.coverAlt: How To Transcribe A Foreign Language Video

nodes.description:
Video Translator's platform provides a client with the ability to transcribe
  and translate content to/from a number of languages. Today we'll transcribe content
  to a different language, and use a practical example to demonstrate the technology.

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo

nodes.title: Clipping Chinese App: How To Translate Video Into Mandarin Chinese With AI

nodes.title: How To Translate YouTube Videos And Dominate SEO

nodes.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

nodes.title: What Is The Best Subtitling Software Available?

  subtitles and a different one to merge them in?
